item.title: Install Searx on Apache2 and uWSGI
item.description: uwsgi Install packages: sudo apt-get install uwsgi uwsgi-plugin-python Add searx user: useradd searx Create the configuration file /etc/uwsgi/apps-enabled/searx.ini with this content: [uwsgi] # Who will run the code uid = searx gid = searx # Number of workers (usually CPU count) workers = 4 # The right granted on the created socket chmod-socket = 666 # Plugin to use and interpretor config single-interpreter = true master = true plugin = python3 lazy-apps = true enable-threads = true # Module to import module = searx.
